name: The Secret Behind the Storm
description:
You are a flying squirrel escaping from the snow storm. But there is something curious happening on the flying islands and it is your job to uncover the secret behind the storm.

Play using keyboard and mouse or a controller. Fly around, talk to other squirrels for an energy boost and outrun the hurricane.

This game was made in 6 days during the Unreal Spring Jam 2020. The game tackles themes of anxiety, how it feels to be affected by it, and overcoming it. A cute, wholesome experience that plays well on a rainy day.

Programming / Gameplay Design: Simon Ulander, Ott Madis Ozolit
3D / Technical Art: Dennis Kurzeja
2D / Concept Art: Leene Künnap
Music / Sound Design: Adam Bow

Known bug: Walking into NPCs or pushing them, and then interacting with them, can make the camera bug out and make your character fall through the floor. 

Recommended workaround: Interact to NPCs from afar.
